question: 池
sourceMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
sourceReadingMnemonic: If you fall into a <vocabulary>pond</vocabulary>, what sound do you make? <reading>EEEEK</reading> (<ja>いけ</ja>)! Or maybe you're just afraid of ponds (I don't blame you, there are probably snakes or leeches or alligators in there) and you EEEEK when someone mentions them.
